  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Opazuj, primerjaj, nariši</string>
            <string language="en">Look, find, draw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schauen Sie, finden Sie, zeichnen Sie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regardez, trouvez, dessinez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhe, encontre, desenhe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservi, trovi, dissipi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοιτάξτε, βρείτε, σύρετε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mire, encuentre, trace</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec naj rešuje po eno ali največ dve nalogi hkrati. Nalogo dajemo vsak dan. Reševalec razvija sposobnost zaznavanja povezav med različnimi elementi in razločuje bistveno na področju geometrične strukture.</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing the picture composed of lines by careful comparison with the original.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">primerjanje</string>
            <string language="en">comparison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ocenjevanje</string>
            <string language="en">evaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeichnen bestanden aus Zeilen durch
vorsichtigen Vergleich mit der Vorlage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessinant l'image composée de lignes par 
comparaison soigneuse avec l'original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhando o retrato composto das linhas pela 
comparação cuidadosa com o original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipando l'immagine composta di righe tramite 
il confronto attento con l'originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύροντας την εικόνα που αποτελείται από τις γραμμές 
από την προσεκτική σύγκριση με τον αρχικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazando el cuadro integrado por líneas por la 
comparación cuidadosa con la original.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswertung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comparaison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">observação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">osservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">confronto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρατήρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγκριση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">observación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comparación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
